component.name: Belgian electronic ID software
component.summary: The eID middleware for using your Belgian electronic ID card in various pieces of software

description.p: The eID software allows you to use yoru electronic identity card in various applications, such as:

ul.li: Browsers: Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome
En alle andere bibliotheken of toepassingen die het gebruik van PKCS#11-modules toelaten.

description.p: This package contains the PKCS#11 module, a software module for using external cryptographic aids, such as the eID.
